knimeNode.name: Column Appender
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends column from one table to another based on a common key

fullDescription.intro: This node adds the columns from the second table to the first table. The rows are mapped bases on the values of cells in two columns that the user can choose. The first table may contain the same value in several rows of the join column, whereas the second table must not. As a side effect the output table is sorted on the join column.
fullDescription.option: The column from the left table which should be used for joining rows
The column from the right table which should be used for joining rows
Determines the handling of column with the same name (except the join column) in both columns
The suffix appended to duplicate columns from the right table
